price: Ово је Наш дар, па ти даруј или ускрати, нећеш због тога да одговараш!
arabic: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhā ʿaṭāunā fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri ḥisābin
